introduction: FCCU was founded in 1864 with a vision to impart quality education to the people of this region and to contribute to their academic, economic and social development. From the premises of a small college, FCCU has grown into an academically robust university that offers a wide range of opportunities to its students to grow and reach their full potential.Â  FCCU welcomes students from all backgrounds and all regions of Pakistan and abroad to a University where they live, grow and learn, meet some of the greatest thinkers in their chosen disciplines and make lifelong friendships- a place they can truly call home.
